screenshot.title: Screenshot
screenshot.mobileAdaptDesc: Auto-scale width when taking screenshots for mobile viewing

network.title: Network
network.proxyModeDesc: How to connect when accessing external services
network.invalidProxyUrl: Please enter a valid proxy address, e.g. http://127.0.0.1:7890
network.onlyHttpSupported: Only http:// or https:// protocols are supported

empty.title: No AI service configured
empty.description: Add a configuration to start using AI features

modal.configNamePlaceholderPreset: Leave empty to use provider name
modal.configNamePlaceholderCustom: Leave empty to use API endpoint
modal.apiKeyPlaceholderEdit: Enter new API Key (leave empty to keep current)
modal.apiKeyPlaceholderLocal: Usually not required for local services
modal.apiKeyHintLocal: Enter if the service requires authentication
modal.modelNameHint: Enter the model name supported by the API
modal.modelNameHintLocal: Enter the locally deployed model name
modal.disableThinkingDesc: For models like Qwen3, DeepSeek-R1. Uses standard tool calling format when disabled.
modal.isReasoningModelDesc: Extracts thinking process and disables tool calling (e.g. DeepSeek-R1, QwQ)

storage.title: Local Storage Management
storage.description: Manage data files stored locally by ChatLab

dataLocation.title: Data Directory
dataLocation.description: Customize where local data and cache are stored
dataLocation.restartTip: Please restart the app after switching. Data will be migrated from the old directory.
dataLocation.confirmMessage: You are about to change the data storage location. Existing data will be migrated to the new directory.
dataLocation.confirmWarning: After restarting, the old data directory will be automatically deleted. Please ensure the new path is correct.
dataLocation.migrationSuccessMessage: The app needs to restart for changes to take effect.

notes.title: Notes
notes.logSafe: Log files are mainly for debugging and can be safely cleared
notes.noRecover: All cleared files cannot be recovered, please proceed with caution

ai.name: AI Chat Databases
ai.description: AI chat history and config files

logs.name: Log Files
logs.description: App logs including import, AI, error logs

session.title: Session Index Settings
session.description: Session index splits chat history into conversation segments by time gaps for better AI analysis
session.thresholdHelp: Messages exceeding this time gap will be split into a new session
session.generateHint: Generate index to help AI better understand conversation context
session.generateSuccess: Session index generated successfully, {count} sessions created

maxMessages.title: Max Messages per Request
maxMessages.description: Max number of messages sent to AI per request. Higher values consume more tokens but provide more accurate context (recommended: 2000).

maxHistory.title: Context Limit
maxHistory.description: Number of recent conversation rounds to keep (1 round = User + AI). Prevents excessive token usage.

exportFormat.title: Export Format
exportFormat.description: File format for exporting AI conversations

sqlExportFormat.title: SQL Lab Export Format
sqlExportFormat.description: File format for exporting SQL query results

presets.title: System Prompts
presets.description: Prompts are used for both group and private chat analysis, system adjusts content based on analysis type

modal.applicableToHint: (Check to enable for corresponding analysis type)
modal.roleDefinitionPlaceholder: Define the AI assistant's role and tasks...
modal.responseRulesPlaceholder: Define AI response format and requirements...
modal.previewHint: (Preview shows group chat mode, actual will adjust based on analysis type)

importPreset.title: Import Presets
importPreset.description: Get recommended system prompt presets from remote

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.analyticsDesc: When enabled, the app collects non-sensitive data like version number and OS version to help improve the product

developer.title: Developer Options
developer.debugModeDesc: When enabled, AI logs will include full raw message content without truncation. Log files may grow significantly

embedding.title: Vector Model
embedding.description: Uses embedding vectors to understand question meaning, enables AI to perform semantic search
embedding.noConfigs: No configs yet, click the button above to add
embedding.apiSourceHint: "Reuse Chat Model" will use the endpoint and key from the active chat model
embedding.vectorStoreDesc: Cache computed vectors to avoid recalculation and improve speed
embedding.clearVectorStoreConfirm: Clear all vector cache? This will cause recalculation on next search.

aiPreprocess.title: Chat Preprocessing
aiPreprocess.description: Preprocess chat records before sending to AI to save tokens and filter noise. Original data is not modified.
aiPreprocess.dataCleaningDesc: Automatically clean XML card messages (shared links, mini-programs, etc.), extracting useful content and significantly saving tokens. Recommended to keep enabled.
aiPreprocess.mergeConsecutiveDesc: Merge consecutive messages from the same sender within a short time window
aiPreprocess.denoiseDesc: Filter out meaningless messages like interjections, emojis, and system placeholders (e.g. [Image])
aiPreprocess.desensitizeDesc: Replace sensitive information (phone numbers, emails, ID numbers, etc.) based on rules
aiPreprocess.desensitizeRulesDesc: Check the rules to enable. Rules are matched in list order
aiPreprocess.anonymizeNamesDesc: Replace real nicknames with IDs (U1, U2…) when sending to AI, reducing hallucinations and saving tokens
aiPreprocess.blacklistDesc: Messages containing any of these keywords will be filtered out entirely
aiPreprocess.blacklistPlaceholder: Type a keyword and press Enter to add

rules.api_key_prefix_desc: Strings starting with sk-, ghp_, AKIA, etc.
rules.url_desc: Links starting with http:// or https://
